summary:
This is a Work In Progress mod.
<br />It will aim to change npc's walking behavior in escorting quests.
<br />Only the first main quest is finished so far.
descriptionHtml:
[size=1]Personal Note: English isn't my motherlanguage, so forgive me for the badly used words^^' Also, this is my first mod, and i just started using the Creation-Kit, but since this only changes the preferred speed through quests, it most likely wont do anything bad to your game.
<br />
<br />[/size]
<br />This mod is most likely suited for only a small group of players!!!
<br />
<br />Npc's will walk instead of running in escorting quests, so you won't have to hurry up and follow them without looking around.
<br />
<br />This version only changes the way the game starts, it affects only Ralof and Hadvar.
author: sennyuu
